entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 8.6°C
Wind: SE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
